lines.text: Stallwat was constructed by flesh slugs, uh humans, who fell under the cruel vice of D'Compose.
Keep your eyes opened. D'Compose can jump out at us from anywhere.
[Sandra throws a skull shaped rock at Herc]

[as the Granites and Herc go on the defensive]
Herc please stop! You're hurting me.
She recognizes me. Sandra listen to me we have to expose you to sunlight. That's the only way we're going to get you back to normal.

[as he sees a bunch of skeletons, that were once human but are now decrepit and decaying shells of their former selves, charging towards them shrieking.]
They were once knights and now they are D'Compose's dark minions. Granites we fight to the death!
But how do you kill something that's already dead?
Now flesh slug! Tell me where you keep your primal energy source?

[after Herc gets her on her back and exposes her to sunlight]
NO! NOOOOOOO!
[Sandra returns to her normal size. Herc and Grana-Q kneel down to see if Sandra is okay. Sandra groans]
Oh Herc! I had a bad dream.
[getting up off her back and opening her eyes]
It wasn't a dream was it?

[holding on to Herc]
Herc there's so much I have to tell you.
